title: Self-Determined Learning Program for Enhancing Mathematical Education Leadership Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational mathematics education theory and basic instructional design concepts
context.additional_context: Project-Based Learning Program for Corporate Mathematics Education Managers/Leaders in a BYOD Environment. Learners Self-Direct Learning Plans, Execute Tasks, and Engage in Continuous Reflection Through Peer Feedback

learning_goals: Learners can develop a mathematics education professional development plan using self-reflection tools.
Learners can improve PBL project outcomes to over 80% completion based on peer feedback.
Learners can enhance learning efficiency by over 20% by applying digital resource management strategies in BYOD environments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
